content: Guest complaint: loud music from next-room party at Lakeview Resort. Partial refund offered.
Corporate group complained about slow Wi-Fi in conference hall at Urban Plaza. Tech reset done.
metadata: Ref: booking_records.json (BOOK-202), date: 2025-03-06, partial apology credit

content: Beachside Inn family found housekeeping missed kids’ bedding change. Resolved next day.

content: Mountain Lodge cabin had fireplace smoke smell. Maintenance rechecked flue, offered free s’mores kit.

content: Airport Express Suites business traveler complained about shuttle delay. Driver stuck in traffic.
